title: Securing U.S. Critical Infrastructure: Lessons from Stuxnet and the Ukraine Power Grid Attacks
summary: Industrial Control Systems (ICS) underpin the United States' critical infrastructure, managing essential services such as power, water, and transportation that are vital to national security and public safety. However, increasing digital integration has exposed these systems to escalating cyber threats.
